APSEZL is continuously expanding its presence across the coastline through organic capacity expansion at existing ports and also through new ports. It is currently developing a transshipment port at Vizhinjam, Kerala. The Company s integrated services across three verticals, i.e. Ports, Logistics and SEZ, has enabled it to forge alliances with leading Indian businesses making APSEZ an undisputed leader in the Indian ports & logistics sector.'.
